name: Hydra
description: A massive, multi-headed reptilian monster with a serpentine body and thick, scaly hide.
memorable: Each severed head grows two new heads unless cauterized, making it nearly unstoppable in combat.
goals: Relentless predator that ambushes prey in watery environments.
relations: May be encountered in lairs near swamps or lakes, often found alone or in pairs.
environment: Swamps, lakes, or caves near bodies of water.
strengths: Regenerates heads and health rapidly, possesses multiple attacks with each head.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, which can prevent regeneration.
attacks: Bite attacks with each of its heads, capable of dealing significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Regenerative heads that allow it to grow new heads unless fire damage is dealt.
senses: Keenly aware with a passive Perception of 16.
skills: Good at stealth and perception, allowing it to remain hidden and sense surroundings effectively.
additional_information: Can hold its breath for 1 hour.
Toxic secretions poison water within its lair, affecting nearby creatures.
At least one head remains awake while the hydra sleeps.
Gains extra reactions for opportunity attacks with additional heads.
Has advantage on saving throws against various conditions due to multiple heads.
test_queries: giant creature with multiple biting heads
